alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Moore, southeastern Montgomery and northeastern Richmond Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Hoffman, or 10 miles north of Rockingham, moving northeast at 35 mph. Training thunderstorms may lead to localized flooding from Ellerbe northeast into Carthage. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Rockingham, Carthage, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Ellerbe and Foxfire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
